basic.description: The practical study of teaching techniques of standard musical repertoire (solo, chamber, orchestral, operatic, etc.) of a particular instrument. The course requires student performances of representative musical works. The instruments studied will rotate from year to year as resources permit.
basic.subject: MUSC
basic.title: Applied Pedagogy I

extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQUISITES    (MUSC 120/6.0 or MUSC 121/6.0 or MUSC 124/6.0) and permission of the School.
